fields.name: departureDate
fields.comment: Departure date in realtime parsed for displaying in user dialog.

fields.name: departureTime
fields.comment: Departure time in realtime parsed for displaying in user dialog.

fields.name: departureDelay
fields.comment: Departure delay in realtime parsed for displaying in user dialog.

fields.name: departurePlatformChanged
fields.comment: Flag to determine whether departurePlatform has changed in comparison to planned departurePlatform.
